sentences.en: As ersatz investment banks, they make short - and long - term loans and take equity stakes.
sentences.cn: 他们有时充当了投资银行的职能, 他们提供 短期 和 长期 借贷以及购买公司股份.

sentences.en: But Mr Caruso has brought the open - air mall to a pitch of ersatz perfection.
sentences.cn: 但卡鲁索已使露天购物商城的功能发挥到了人工的尽善尽美的程度.

sentences.en: Ersatz coffee made mostly of chicory.
sentences.cn: 代用咖啡主要是用菊苣做成的.

sentences.en: The ersatz spontaneity of "Sunday Love" sounds especially hollow.
sentences.cn: 对《星期天的爱情》这首歌的即兴模仿听起来尤其空洞。

sentences.en: There were few provisions available in exchange for food stamps: ersatz coffee, macaroni, small cubes of margarine.
sentences.cn: 可以用来换取粮票的食物只有这些：代用咖啡、通心粉和小块的人造黄油。

sentences.en: Tourists are the ones having the ersatz experience.
sentences.cn: 观光客得到的是一种模拟的感受.

trans.tran_cn: 人造的，代用的，合成的（因而质量不如真品）
trans.tran_en: artificial, and not as good as the real thing
